title: User Authentication & Role Detection
text: User Authentication & Role Detection: secure login system to identify staff and map them to their respective roles. Use role based access and map designation like Clerk, Officer, Admin for personalized training.

title: Chatbot Interaction Layer
text: Chatbot Interaction Layer: an AI/NLP-powered chatbot interface for natural, conversational training support that guides staff step-by-step through eSarkar tasks.

title: Role-based Content Delivery
text: Role-based Content Delivery: provides personalized training modules aligned with staff duties, for example Clerk data entry, Officer approval, Admin report generation.

title: Query Handling & Multilingual Support
text: Query Handling and Multilingual Support: real-time doubt resolution with support for regional languages to ensure accessibility for Bengaluru city staff.

title: Progress Tracking & Reports
text: Progress Tracking and Reports: monitors learning progress, completion rates, and generates performance reports for supervisors.

title: Admin Dashboard & Analytics
text: Admin Dashboard & Analytics: enables supervisors to view staff training status, track adoption and analyze usage trends.

title: Integration with eSarkar APIs
text: Integration with eSarkar APIs: seamless connectivity with existing eSarkar modules for contextual training, direct links and sample flows.

title: Data Entry (Clerk)
text: As a Clerk, you enter citizen details in the New Form section of eSarkar: select New Form, enter fields (name, id, address), validate and save. Use the Save button and check validation messages.

title: Approval Process (Officer)
text: As an Officer, you review and approve applications under the Approval tab: open pending list, inspect submitted data, click Approve or Reject and add comments if needed.

title: Report Generation (Admin/Officer)
text: Report Generation: reports are available under Reports menu. Choose filters (department, date range), click Generate and export as PDF/CSV for administrative purposes.

title: IT Support - Password Reset
text: IT Support: to reset passwords, go to Admin > User Management, select user, click Reset Password and share temporary password. Encourage two-factor authentication setup.
